185    def fit(self, X_train, X_test, xreg=None, **kwargs):
186        """Fit Regression algorithms to X_train, predict and score on X_test.
187
188        Parameters:
189
190            X_train: array-like,
191                Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
192                and columns is the number of features.
193
194            X_test: array-like,
195                Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
196                and columns is the number of features.
197
198            xreg: array-like, optional (default=None)
199                Additional (external) regressors to be passed to self.obj
200                xreg must be in 'increasing' order (most recent observations last)
201
202        Returns:
203
204            scores: Pandas DataFrame
205                Returns metrics of all the models in a Pandas DataFrame.
206
207            predictions: Pandas DataFrame
208                Returns predictions of all the models in a Pandas DataFrame.
209
210        """
211        R2 = []
212        ADJR2 = []
213        ME = []
214        MPL = []
215        RMSE = []
216        MAE = []
217        MPE = []
218        MAPE = []
219
220        # WIN = []
221        names = []
222        TIME = []
223        predictions = {}
224
225        if self.custom_metric:
226            CUSTOM_METRIC = []
227
228        if isinstance(X_train, np.ndarray):
229            X_train = pd.DataFrame(X_train)
230            X_test = pd.DataFrame(X_test)
231
232        X_train = convert_df_to_numeric(X_train)
233        X_test = convert_df_to_numeric(X_test)
234
235        numeric_features = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns
236        categorical_features = X_train.select_dtypes(include=["object"]).columns
237
238        categorical_low, categorical_high = get_card_split(
239            X_train, categorical_features
240        )
241
242        if self.preprocess:
243            preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
244                transformers=[
245                    ("numeric", numeric_transformer, numeric_features),
246                    (
247                        "categorical_low",
248                        categorical_transformer_low,
249                        categorical_low,
250                    ),
251                    (
252                        "categorical_high",
253                        categorical_transformer_high,
254                        categorical_high,
255                    ),
256                ]
257            )
258
259        if self.estimators == "all":
260            self.regressors = REGRESSORSMTS
261        else:
262            self.regressors = [
263                ("MTS(" + est[0] + ")", est[1])
264                for est in all_estimators()
265                if (
266                    issubclass(est[1], RegressorMixin)
267                    and (est[0] in self.estimators)
268                )
269            ]
270
271        if self.preprocess is True:
272            for name, model in tqdm(self.regressors):  # do parallel exec
273                start = time.time()
274                try:
275                    if "random_state" in model().get_params().keys():
276                        pipe = Pipeline(
277                            steps=[
278                                ("preprocessor", preprocessor),
279                                (
280                                    "regressor",
281                                    MTS(
282                                        obj=model(
283                                            random_state=self.random_state,
284                                            **kwargs
285                                        ),
286                                        n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
287                                        activation_name=self.activation_name,
288                                        a=self.a,
289                                        nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
290                                        bias=self.bias,
291                                        dropout=self.dropout,
292                                        direct_link=self.direct_link,
293                                        n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
294                                        cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
295                                        type_clust=self.type_clust,
296                                        type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
297                                        lags=self.lags,
298                                        replications=self.replications,
299                                        kernel=self.kernel,
300                                        agg=self.agg,
301                                        seed=self.seed,
302                                        backend=self.backend,
303                                        show_progress=self.show_progress,
304                                    ),
305                                ),
306                            ]
307                        )
308                    else:
309                        pipe = Pipeline(
310                            steps=[
311                                ("preprocessor", preprocessor),
312                                (
313                                    "regressor",
314                                    MTS(
315                                        obj=model(**kwargs),
316                                        n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
317                                        activation_name=self.activation_name,
318                                        a=self.a,
319                                        nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
320                                        bias=self.bias,
321                                        dropout=self.dropout,
322                                        direct_link=self.direct_link,
323                                        n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
324                                        cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
325                                        type_clust=self.type_clust,
326                                        type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
327                                        lags=self.lags,
328                                        replications=self.replications,
329                                        kernel=self.kernel,
330                                        agg=self.agg,
331                                        seed=self.seed,
332                                        backend=self.backend,
333                                        show_progress=self.show_progress,
334                                    ),
335                                ),
336                            ]
337                        )
338
339                    pipe.fit(X_train, **kwargs)
340                    # pipe.fit(X_train, xreg=xreg)
341
342                    self.models[name] = pipe
343
344                    X_pred = pipe["regressor"].predict(
345                        h=X_test.shape[0], **kwargs
346                    )
347
348                    rmse = mean_squared_error(X_test, X_pred, squared=False)
349                    mae = mean_absolute_error(X_test, X_pred)
350                    mpl = mean_pinball_loss(X_test, X_pred)
351
352                    names.append(name)
353                    RMSE.append(rmse)
354                    MAE.append(mae)
355                    MPL.append(mpl)
356                    TIME.append(time.time() - start)
357
358                    if self.custom_metric:
359                        custom_metric = self.custom_metric(X_test, X_pred)
360                        CUSTOM_METRIC.append(custom_metric)
361
362                    if self.verbose > 0:
363                        scores_verbose = {
364                            "Model": name,
365                            # "R-Squared": r_squared,
366                            # "Adjusted R-Squared": adj_rsquared,
367                            "RMSE": rmse,
368                            "MAE": mae,
369                            "MPL": mpl,
370                            # "MPE": mpe,
371                            # "MAPE": mape,
372                            "Time taken": time.time() - start,
373                        }
374
375                        if self.custom_metric:
376                            scores_verbose[self.custom_metric.__name__] = (
377                                custom_metric
378                            )
379
380                        print(scores_verbose)
381                    if self.predictions:
382                        predictions[name] = X_pred
383                except Exception as exception:
384                    if self.ignore_warnings is False:
385                        print(name + " model failed to execute")
386                        print(exception)
387
388        else:  # no preprocessing
389            for name, model in tqdm(self.regressors):  # do parallel exec
390                start = time.time()
391                try:
392                    if "random_state" in model().get_params().keys():
393                        pipe = MTS(
394                            obj=model(random_state=self.random_state, **kwargs),
395                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
396                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
397                            a=self.a,
398                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
399                            bias=self.bias,
400                            dropout=self.dropout,
401                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
402                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
403                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
404                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
405                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
406                            lags=self.lags,
407                            replications=self.replications,
408                            kernel=self.kernel,
409                            agg=self.agg,
410                            seed=self.seed,
411                            backend=self.backend,
412                            show_progress=self.show_progress,
413                        )
414                    else:
415                        pipe = MTS(
416                            obj=model(**kwargs),
417                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
418                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
419                            a=self.a,
420                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
421                            bias=self.bias,
422                            dropout=self.dropout,
423                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
424                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
425                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
426                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
427                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
428                            lags=self.lags,
429                            replications=self.replications,
430                            kernel=self.kernel,
431                            agg=self.agg,
432                            seed=self.seed,
433                            backend=self.backend,
434                            show_progress=self.show_progress,
435                        )
436
437                    pipe.fit(X_train, xreg, **kwargs)
438                    # pipe.fit(X_train, xreg=xreg) # DO xreg like in `ahead`
439
440                    self.models[name] = pipe
441
442                    if self.preprocess is True:
443                        X_pred = pipe["regressor"].predict(
444                            h=X_test.shape[0], **kwargs
445                        )
446                    else:
447                        X_pred = pipe.predict(
448                            h=X_test.shape[0], **kwargs
449                        )  # X_pred = pipe.predict(h=X_test.shape[0], new_xreg=new_xreg) ## DO xreg like in `ahead`
450
451                    rmse = mean_squared_error(X_test, X_pred, squared=False)
452                    mae = mean_absolute_error(X_test, X_pred)
453                    mpl = mean_pinball_loss(X_test, X_pred)
454
455                    names.append(name)
456                    RMSE.append(rmse)
457                    MAE.append(mae)
458                    MPL.append(mpl)
459                    TIME.append(time.time() - start)
460
461                    if self.custom_metric:
462                        custom_metric = self.custom_metric(X_test, X_pred)
463                        CUSTOM_METRIC.append(custom_metric)
464
465                    if self.verbose > 0:
466                        scores_verbose = {
467                            "Model": name,
468                            # "R-Squared": r_squared,
469                            # "Adjusted R-Squared": adj_rsquared,
470                            "RMSE": rmse,
471                            "MAE": mae,
472                            "MPL": mpl,
473                            # "MPE": mpe,
474                            # "MAPE": mape,
475                            "Time taken": time.time() - start,
476                        }
477
478                        if self.custom_metric:
479                            scores_verbose[self.custom_metric.__name__] = (
480                                custom_metric
481                            )
482
483                        print(scores_verbose)
484                    if self.predictions:
485                        predictions[name] = X_pred
486                except Exception as exception:
487                    if self.ignore_warnings is False:
488                        print(name + " model failed to execute")
489                        print(exception)
490
491        scores = {
492            "Model": names,
493            # "Adjusted R-Squared": ADJR2,
494            # "R-Squared": R2,
495            "RMSE": RMSE,
496            "MAE": MAE,
497            "MPL": MPL,
498            # "MPE": MPE,
499            # "MAPE": MAPE,
500            "Time Taken": TIME,
501        }
502
503        if self.custom_metric:
504            scores[self.custom_metric.__name__] = CUSTOM_METRIC
505
506        scores = pd.DataFrame(scores)
507        scores = scores.sort_values(by="RMSE", ascending=True).set_index(
508            "Model"
509        )
510
511        if self.predictions:
512            predictions_df = pd.DataFrame.from_dict(predictions)
513        return scores, predictions_df if self.predictions is True else scores

Fit Regression algorithms to X_train, predict and score on X_test.

Parameters:

X_train: array-like,
    Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
    and columns is the number of features.

X_test: array-like,
    Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
    and columns is the number of features.

xreg: array-like, optional (default=None)
    Additional (external) regressors to be passed to self.obj
    xreg must be in 'increasing' order (most recent observations last)

Returns:

scores: Pandas DataFrame
    Returns metrics of all the models in a Pandas DataFrame.

predictions: Pandas DataFrame
    Returns predictions of all the models in a Pandas DataFrame.
def provide_models(self, X_train, X_test): 
515    def provide_models(self, X_train, X_test):
516        """
517        This function returns all the model objects trained in fit function.
518        If fit is not called already, then we call fit and then return the models.
519
520        Parameters:
521
522            X_train : array-like,
523                Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
524                and columns is the number of features.
525
526            X_test : array-like,
527                Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
528                and columns is the number of features.
529
530        Returns:
531
532            models: dict-object,
533                Returns a dictionary with each model pipeline as value
534                with key as name of models.
535
536        """
537        if len(self.models.keys()) == 0:
538            self.fit(X_train, X_test)
539
540        return self.models

This function returns all the model objects trained in fit function. If fit is not called already, then we call fit and then return the models.

Parameters:

X_train : array-like,
    Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
    and columns is the number of features.

X_test : array-like,
    Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
    and columns is the number of features.

Returns:

models: dict-object,
    Returns a dictionary with each model pipeline as value
    with key as name of models.
class LazyDeepClassifier(nnetsauce.custom.custom.Custom, sklearn.base.ClassifierMixin): 
 67class LazyDeepClassifier(Custom, ClassifierMixin):
 68    """
 69
 70    Fitting -- almost -- all the classification algorithms with layers of
 71    nnetsauce's CustomClassifier and returning their scores.
 72
 73    Parameters:
 74
 75        verbose: int, optional (default=0)
 76            Any positive number for verbosity.
 77
 78        ignore_warnings: bool, optional (default=True)
 79            When set to True, the warning related to algorigms that are not
 80            able to run are ignored.
 81
 82        custom_metric: function, optional (default=None)
 83            When function is provided, models are evaluated based on the custom
 84              evaluation metric provided.
 85
 86        predictions: bool, optional (default=False)
 87            When set to True, the predictions of all the models models are
 88            returned as data frame.
 89
 90        sort_by: string, optional (default='Accuracy')
 91            Sort models by a metric. Available options are 'Accuracy',
 92            'Balanced Accuracy', 'ROC AUC', 'F1 Score' or a custom metric
 93            identified by its name and provided by custom_metric.
 94
 95        random_state: int, optional (default=42)
 96            Reproducibiility seed.
 97
 98        estimators: list, optional (default='all')
 99            list of Estimators names or just 'all' for > 90 classifiers
100            (default='all')
101
102        preprocess: bool, preprocessing is done when set to True
103
104        n_jobs: int, when possible, run in parallel
105            For now, only used by individual models that support it.
106
107        n_layers: int, optional (default=3)
108            Number of layers of CustomClassifiers to be used.
109
110        All the other parameters are the same as CustomClassifier's.
111
112
113    Examples
114
115        ```python
116        import nnetsauce as ns
117        from sklearn.datasets import load_breast_cancer
118        from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
119        data = load_breast_cancer()
120        X = data.data
121        y= data.target
122        X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=.2,
123            random_state=123)
124        clf = ns.LazyDeepClassifier(verbose=0, ignore_warnings=True, custom_metric=None)
125        models, predictions = clf.fit(X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test)
126        model_dictionary = clf.provide_models(X_train,X_test,y_train,y_test)
127        print(models)
128        ```
129
130    """
131
132    def __init__(
133        self,
134        verbose=0,
135        ignore_warnings=True,
136        custom_metric=None,
137        predictions=False,
138        sort_by="Accuracy",
139        random_state=42,
140        estimators="all",
141        preprocess=False,
142        n_jobs=None,
143        # Defining depth
144        n_layers=3,
145        # CustomClassifier attributes
146        obj=None,
147        n_hidden_features=5,
148        activation_name="relu",
149        a=0.01,
150        nodes_sim="sobol",
151        bias=True,
152        dropout=0,
153        direct_link=True,
154        n_clusters=2,
155        cluster_encode=True,
156        type_clust="kmeans",
157        type_scaling=("std", "std", "std"),
158        col_sample=1,
159        row_sample=1,
160        seed=123,
161        backend="cpu",
162    ):
163        self.verbose = verbose
164        self.ignore_warnings = ignore_warnings
165        self.custom_metric = custom_metric
166        self.predictions = predictions
167        self.sort_by = sort_by
168        self.models = {}
169        self.random_state = random_state
170        self.estimators = estimators
171        self.preprocess = preprocess
172        self.n_layers = n_layers - 1
173        self.n_jobs = n_jobs
174        super().__init__(
175            obj=obj,
176            n_hidden_features=n_hidden_features,
177            activation_name=activation_name,
178            a=a,
179            nodes_sim=nodes_sim,
180            bias=bias,
181            dropout=dropout,
182            direct_link=direct_link,
183            n_clusters=n_clusters,
184            cluster_encode=cluster_encode,
185            type_clust=type_clust,
186            type_scaling=type_scaling,
187            col_sample=col_sample,
188            row_sample=row_sample,
189            seed=seed,
190            backend=backend,
191        )
192
193    def fit(self, X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test):
194        """Fit classifiers to X_train and y_train, predict and score on X_test,
195        y_test.
196
197        Parameters:
198
199            X_train: array-like,
200                Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
201                and columns is the number of features.
202
203            X_test: array-like,
204                Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
205                and columns is the number of features.
206
207            y_train: array-like,
208                Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
209                and columns is the number of features.
210
211            y_test: array-like,
212                Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
213                and columns is the number of features.
214
215        Returns:
216
217            scores: Pandas DataFrame
218                Returns metrics of all the models in a Pandas DataFrame.
219
220            predictions: Pandas DataFrame
221                Returns predictions of all the models in a Pandas DataFrame.
222        """
223        Accuracy = []
224        B_Accuracy = []
225        ROC_AUC = []
226        F1 = []
227        names = []
228        TIME = []
229        predictions = {}
230
231        if self.custom_metric is not None:
232            CUSTOM_METRIC = []
233
234        if isinstance(X_train, np.ndarray):
235            X_train = pd.DataFrame(X_train)
236            X_test = pd.DataFrame(X_test)
237
238        numeric_features = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns
239        categorical_features = X_train.select_dtypes(include=["object"]).columns
240
241        categorical_low, categorical_high = get_card_split(
242            X_train, categorical_features
243        )
244
245        if self.preprocess is True:
246            preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
247                transformers=[
248                    ("numeric", numeric_transformer, numeric_features),
249                    (
250                        "categorical_low",
251                        categorical_transformer_low,
252                        categorical_low,
253                    ),
254                    (
255                        "categorical_high",
256                        categorical_transformer_high,
257                        categorical_high,
258                    ),
259                ]
260            )
261
262        if self.estimators == "all":
263            self.classifiers = [
264                item
265                for sublist in [
266                    DEEPCLASSIFIERS,
267                    DEEPMULTITASKCLASSIFIERS,
268                    DEEPSIMPLEMULTITASKCLASSIFIERS,
269                ]
270                for item in sublist
271            ]
272        else:
273            self.classifiers = (
274                [
275                    ("DeepCustomClassifier(" + est[0] + ")", est[1])
276                    for est in all_estimators()
277                    if (
278                        issubclass(est[1], ClassifierMixin)
279                        and (est[0] in self.estimators)
280                    )
281                ]
282                + [
283                    (
284                        "DeepMultitaskClassifier(" + est[0] + ")",
285                        partial(MultitaskClassifier, obj=est[1]()),
286                    )
287                    for est in all_estimators()
288                    if (
289                        issubclass(est[1], RegressorMixin)
290                        and (est[0] in self.estimators)
291                    )
292                ]
293                + [
294                    (
295                        "DeepSimpleMultitaskClassifier(" + est[0] + ")",
296                        partial(SimpleMultitaskClassifier, obj=est[1]()),
297                    )
298                    for est in all_estimators()
299                    if (
300                        issubclass(est[1], RegressorMixin)
301                        and (est[0] in self.estimators)
302                    )
303                ]
304            )
305
306        if self.preprocess is True:
307
308            for name, model in tqdm(self.classifiers):  # do parallel exec
309
310                other_args = (
311                    {}
312                )  # use this trick for `random_state` too --> refactor
313                try:
314                    if (
315                        "n_jobs" in model().get_params().keys()
316                        and name.find("LogisticRegression") == -1
317                    ):
318                        other_args["n_jobs"] = self.n_jobs
319                except Exception:
320                    pass
321
322                start = time.time()
323
324                try:
325                    if "random_state" in model().get_params().keys():
326                        layer_clf = CustomClassifier(
327                            obj=model(random_state=self.random_state),
328                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
329                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
330                            a=self.a,
331                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
332                            bias=self.bias,
333                            dropout=self.dropout,
334                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
335                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
336                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
337                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
338                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
339                            col_sample=self.col_sample,
340                            row_sample=self.row_sample,
341                            seed=self.seed,
342                            backend=self.backend,
343                        )
344
345                    else:
346                        layer_clf = CustomClassifier(
347                            obj=model(),
348                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
349                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
350                            a=self.a,
351                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
352                            bias=self.bias,
353                            dropout=self.dropout,
354                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
355                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
356                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
357                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
358                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
359                            col_sample=self.col_sample,
360                            row_sample=self.row_sample,
361                            seed=self.seed,
362                            backend=self.backend,
363                        )
364
365                    layer_clf.fit(X_train, y_train)
366
367                    for _ in range(self.n_layers):
368                        layer_clf = deepcopy(
369                            CustomClassifier(
370                                obj=layer_clf,
371                                n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
372                                activation_name=self.activation_name,
373                                a=self.a,
374                                nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
375                                bias=self.bias,
376                                dropout=self.dropout,
377                                direct_link=self.direct_link,
378                                n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
379                                cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
380                                type_clust=self.type_clust,
381                                type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
382                                col_sample=self.col_sample,
383                                row_sample=self.row_sample,
384                                seed=self.seed,
385                                backend=self.backend,
386                            )
387                        )
388
389                    pipe = Pipeline(
390                        [
391                            ("preprocessor", preprocessor),
392                            ("classifier", layer_clf),
393                        ]
394                    )
395
396                    pipe.fit(X_train, y_train)
397                    self.models[name] = pipe
398                    y_pred = pipe.predict(X_test)
399                    accuracy = accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred, normalize=True)
400                    b_accuracy = balanced_accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred)
401                    f1 = f1_score(y_test, y_pred, average="weighted")
402                    try:
403                        roc_auc = roc_auc_score(y_test, y_pred)
404                    except Exception as exception:
405                        roc_auc = None
406                        if self.ignore_warnings is False:
407                            print("ROC AUC couldn't be calculated for " + name)
408                            print(exception)
409                    names.append(name)
410                    Accuracy.append(accuracy)
411                    B_Accuracy.append(b_accuracy)
412                    ROC_AUC.append(roc_auc)
413                    F1.append(f1)
414                    TIME.append(time.time() - start)
415                    if self.custom_metric is not None:
416                        custom_metric = self.custom_metric(y_test, y_pred)
417                        CUSTOM_METRIC.append(custom_metric)
418                    if self.verbose > 0:
419                        if self.custom_metric is not None:
420                            print(
421                                {
422                                    "Model": name,
423                                    "Accuracy": accuracy,
424                                    "Balanced Accuracy": b_accuracy,
425                                    "ROC AUC": roc_auc,
426                                    "F1 Score": f1,
427                                    self.custom_metric.__name__: custom_metric,
428                                    "Time taken": time.time() - start,
429                                }
430                            )
431                        else:
432                            print(
433                                {
434                                    "Model": name,
435                                    "Accuracy": accuracy,
436                                    "Balanced Accuracy": b_accuracy,
437                                    "ROC AUC": roc_auc,
438                                    "F1 Score": f1,
439                                    "Time taken": time.time() - start,
440                                }
441                            )
442                    if self.predictions:
443                        predictions[name] = y_pred
444                except Exception as exception:
445                    if self.ignore_warnings is False:
446                        print(name + " model failed to execute")
447                        print(exception)
448
449        else:  # no preprocessing
450
451            for name, model in tqdm(self.classifiers):  # do parallel exec
452                start = time.time()
453                try:
454                    if "random_state" in model().get_params().keys():
455                        layer_clf = CustomClassifier(
456                            obj=model(random_state=self.random_state),
457                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
458                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
459                            a=self.a,
460                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
461                            bias=self.bias,
462                            dropout=self.dropout,
463                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
464                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
465                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
466                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
467                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
468                            col_sample=self.col_sample,
469                            row_sample=self.row_sample,
470                            seed=self.seed,
471                            backend=self.backend,
472                        )
473
474                    else:
475                        layer_clf = CustomClassifier(
476                            obj=model(),
477                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
478                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
479                            a=self.a,
480                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
481                            bias=self.bias,
482                            dropout=self.dropout,
483                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
484                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
485                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
486                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
487                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
488                            col_sample=self.col_sample,
489                            row_sample=self.row_sample,
490                            seed=self.seed,
491                            backend=self.backend,
492                        )
493
494                    layer_clf.fit(X_train, y_train)
495
496                    for _ in range(self.n_layers):
497                        layer_clf = deepcopy(
498                            CustomClassifier(
499                                obj=layer_clf,
500                                n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
501                                activation_name=self.activation_name,
502                                a=self.a,
503                                nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
504                                bias=self.bias,
505                                dropout=self.dropout,
506                                direct_link=self.direct_link,
507                                n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
508                                cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
509                                type_clust=self.type_clust,
510                                type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
511                                col_sample=self.col_sample,
512                                row_sample=self.row_sample,
513                                seed=self.seed,
514                                backend=self.backend,
515                            )
516                        )
517
518                        # layer_clf.fit(X_train, y_train)
519
520                    layer_clf.fit(X_train, y_train)
521
522                    self.models[name] = layer_clf
523                    y_pred = layer_clf.predict(X_test)
524                    accuracy = accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred, normalize=True)
525                    b_accuracy = balanced_accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred)
526                    f1 = f1_score(y_test, y_pred, average="weighted")
527                    try:
528                        roc_auc = roc_auc_score(y_test, y_pred)
529                    except Exception as exception:
530                        roc_auc = None
531                        if self.ignore_warnings is False:
532                            print("ROC AUC couldn't be calculated for " + name)
533                            print(exception)
534                    names.append(name)
535                    Accuracy.append(accuracy)
536                    B_Accuracy.append(b_accuracy)
537                    ROC_AUC.append(roc_auc)
538                    F1.append(f1)
539                    TIME.append(time.time() - start)
540                    if self.custom_metric is not None:
541                        custom_metric = self.custom_metric(y_test, y_pred)
542                        CUSTOM_METRIC.append(custom_metric)
543                    if self.verbose > 0:
544                        if self.custom_metric is not None:
545                            print(
546                                {
547                                    "Model": name,
548                                    "Accuracy": accuracy,
549                                    "Balanced Accuracy": b_accuracy,
550                                    "ROC AUC": roc_auc,
551                                    "F1 Score": f1,
552                                    self.custom_metric.__name__: custom_metric,
553                                    "Time taken": time.time() - start,
554                                }
555                            )
556                        else:
557                            print(
558                                {
559                                    "Model": name,
560                                    "Accuracy": accuracy,
561                                    "Balanced Accuracy": b_accuracy,
562                                    "ROC AUC": roc_auc,
563                                    "F1 Score": f1,
564                                    "Time taken": time.time() - start,
565                                }
566                            )
567                    if self.predictions:
568                        predictions[name] = y_pred
569                except Exception as exception:
570                    if self.ignore_warnings is False:
571                        print(name + " model failed to execute")
572                        print(exception)
573
574        if self.custom_metric is None:
575            scores = pd.DataFrame(
576                {
577                    "Model": names,
578                    "Accuracy": Accuracy,
579                    "Balanced Accuracy": B_Accuracy,
580                    "ROC AUC": ROC_AUC,
581                    "F1 Score": F1,
582                    "Time Taken": TIME,
583                }
584            )
585        else:
586            scores = pd.DataFrame(
587                {
588                    "Model": names,
589                    "Accuracy": Accuracy,
590                    "Balanced Accuracy": B_Accuracy,
591                    "ROC AUC": ROC_AUC,
592                    "F1 Score": F1,
593                    self.custom_metric.__name__: CUSTOM_METRIC,
594                    "Time Taken": TIME,
595                }
596            )
597        scores = scores.sort_values(by=self.sort_by, ascending=False).set_index(
598            "Model"
599        )
600
601        if self.predictions:
602            predictions_df = pd.DataFrame.from_dict(predictions)
603        return scores, predictions_df if self.predictions is True else scores
604
605    def provide_models(self, X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test):
606        """Returns all the model objects trained. If fit hasn't been called yet,
607        then it's called to return the models.
608
609        Parameters:
610
611        X_train: array-like,
612            Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
613            and columns is the number of features.
614
615        X_test: array-like,
616            Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
617            and columns is the number of features.
618
619        y_train: array-like,
620            Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
621            and columns is the number of features.
622
623        y_test: array-like,
624            Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
625            and columns is the number of features.
626
627        Returns:
628
629            models: dict-object,
630                Returns a dictionary with each model's pipeline as value
631                and key = name of the model.
632        """
633        if len(self.models.keys()) == 0:
634            self.fit(X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test)
635
636        return self.models

Fitting -- almost -- all the classification algorithms with layers of nnetsauce's CustomClassifier and returning their scores.

Parameters:

verbose: int, optional (default=0)
    Any positive number for verbosity.

ignore_warnings: bool, optional (default=True)
    When set to True, the warning related to algorigms that are not
    able to run are ignored.

custom_metric: function, optional (default=None)
    When function is provided, models are evaluated based on the custom
      evaluation metric provided.

predictions: bool, optional (default=False)
    When set to True, the predictions of all the models models are
    returned as data frame.

sort_by: string, optional (default='Accuracy')
    Sort models by a metric. Available options are 'Accuracy',
    'Balanced Accuracy', 'ROC AUC', 'F1 Score' or a custom metric
    identified by its name and provided by custom_metric.

random_state: int, optional (default=42)
    Reproducibiility seed.

estimators: list, optional (default='all')
    list of Estimators names or just 'all' for > 90 classifiers
    (default='all')

preprocess: bool, preprocessing is done when set to True

n_jobs: int, when possible, run in parallel
    For now, only used by individual models that support it.

n_layers: int, optional (default=3)
    Number of layers of CustomClassifiers to be used.

All the other parameters are the same as CustomClassifier's.

Examples 

import nnetsauce as ns
    from sklearn.datasets import load_breast_cancer
    from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
    data = load_breast_cancer()
    X = data.data
    y= data.target
    X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=.2,
        random_state=123)
    clf = ns.LazyDeepClassifier(verbose=0, ignore_warnings=True, custom_metric=None)
    models, predictions = clf.fit(X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test)
    model_dictionary = clf.provide_models(X_train,X_test,y_train,y_test)
    print(models)

def fit(self, X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test): 
193    def fit(self, X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test):
194        """Fit classifiers to X_train and y_train, predict and score on X_test,
195        y_test.
196
197        Parameters:
198
199            X_train: array-like,
200                Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
201                and columns is the number of features.
202
203            X_test: array-like,
204                Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
205                and columns is the number of features.
206
207            y_train: array-like,
208                Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
209                and columns is the number of features.
210
211            y_test: array-like,
212                Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
213                and columns is the number of features.
214
215        Returns:
216
217            scores: Pandas DataFrame
218                Returns metrics of all the models in a Pandas DataFrame.
219
220            predictions: Pandas DataFrame
221                Returns predictions of all the models in a Pandas DataFrame.
222        """
223        Accuracy = []
224        B_Accuracy = []
225        ROC_AUC = []
226        F1 = []
227        names = []
228        TIME = []
229        predictions = {}
230
231        if self.custom_metric is not None:
232            CUSTOM_METRIC = []
233
234        if isinstance(X_train, np.ndarray):
235            X_train = pd.DataFrame(X_train)
236            X_test = pd.DataFrame(X_test)
237
238        numeric_features = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns
239        categorical_features = X_train.select_dtypes(include=["object"]).columns
240
241        categorical_low, categorical_high = get_card_split(
242            X_train, categorical_features
243        )
244
245        if self.preprocess is True:
246            preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
247                transformers=[
248                    ("numeric", numeric_transformer, numeric_features),
249                    (
250                        "categorical_low",
251                        categorical_transformer_low,
252                        categorical_low,
253                    ),
254                    (
255                        "categorical_high",
256                        categorical_transformer_high,
257                        categorical_high,
258                    ),
259                ]
260            )
261
262        if self.estimators == "all":
263            self.classifiers = [
264                item
265                for sublist in [
266                    DEEPCLASSIFIERS,
267                    DEEPMULTITASKCLASSIFIERS,
268                    DEEPSIMPLEMULTITASKCLASSIFIERS,
269                ]
270                for item in sublist
271            ]
272        else:
273            self.classifiers = (
274                [
275                    ("DeepCustomClassifier(" + est[0] + ")", est[1])
276                    for est in all_estimators()
277                    if (
278                        issubclass(est[1], ClassifierMixin)
279                        and (est[0] in self.estimators)
280                    )
281                ]
282                + [
283                    (
284                        "DeepMultitaskClassifier(" + est[0] + ")",
285                        partial(MultitaskClassifier, obj=est[1]()),
286                    )
287                    for est in all_estimators()
288                    if (
289                        issubclass(est[1], RegressorMixin)
290                        and (est[0] in self.estimators)
291                    )
292                ]
293                + [
294                    (
295                        "DeepSimpleMultitaskClassifier(" + est[0] + ")",
296                        partial(SimpleMultitaskClassifier, obj=est[1]()),
297                    )
298                    for est in all_estimators()
299                    if (
300                        issubclass(est[1], RegressorMixin)
301                        and (est[0] in self.estimators)
302                    )
303                ]
304            )
305
306        if self.preprocess is True:
307
308            for name, model in tqdm(self.classifiers):  # do parallel exec
309
310                other_args = (
311                    {}
312                )  # use this trick for `random_state` too --> refactor
313                try:
314                    if (
315                        "n_jobs" in model().get_params().keys()
316                        and name.find("LogisticRegression") == -1
317                    ):
318                        other_args["n_jobs"] = self.n_jobs
319                except Exception:
320                    pass
321
322                start = time.time()
323
324                try:
325                    if "random_state" in model().get_params().keys():
326                        layer_clf = CustomClassifier(
327                            obj=model(random_state=self.random_state),
328                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
329                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
330                            a=self.a,
331                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
332                            bias=self.bias,
333                            dropout=self.dropout,
334                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
335                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
336                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
337                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
338                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
339                            col_sample=self.col_sample,
340                            row_sample=self.row_sample,
341                            seed=self.seed,
342                            backend=self.backend,
343                        )
344
345                    else:
346                        layer_clf = CustomClassifier(
347                            obj=model(),
348                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
349                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
350                            a=self.a,
351                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
352                            bias=self.bias,
353                            dropout=self.dropout,
354                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
355                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
356                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
357                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
358                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
359                            col_sample=self.col_sample,
360                            row_sample=self.row_sample,
361                            seed=self.seed,
362                            backend=self.backend,
363                        )
364
365                    layer_clf.fit(X_train, y_train)
366
367                    for _ in range(self.n_layers):
368                        layer_clf = deepcopy(
369                            CustomClassifier(
370                                obj=layer_clf,
371                                n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
372                                activation_name=self.activation_name,
373                                a=self.a,
374                                nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
375                                bias=self.bias,
376                                dropout=self.dropout,
377                                direct_link=self.direct_link,
378                                n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
379                                cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
380                                type_clust=self.type_clust,
381                                type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
382                                col_sample=self.col_sample,
383                                row_sample=self.row_sample,
384                                seed=self.seed,
385                                backend=self.backend,
386                            )
387                        )
388
389                    pipe = Pipeline(
390                        [
391                            ("preprocessor", preprocessor),
392                            ("classifier", layer_clf),
393                        ]
394                    )
395
396                    pipe.fit(X_train, y_train)
397                    self.models[name] = pipe
398                    y_pred = pipe.predict(X_test)
399                    accuracy = accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred, normalize=True)
400                    b_accuracy = balanced_accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred)
401                    f1 = f1_score(y_test, y_pred, average="weighted")
402                    try:
403                        roc_auc = roc_auc_score(y_test, y_pred)
404                    except Exception as exception:
405                        roc_auc = None
406                        if self.ignore_warnings is False:
407                            print("ROC AUC couldn't be calculated for " + name)
408                            print(exception)
409                    names.append(name)
410                    Accuracy.append(accuracy)
411                    B_Accuracy.append(b_accuracy)
412                    ROC_AUC.append(roc_auc)
413                    F1.append(f1)
414                    TIME.append(time.time() - start)
415                    if self.custom_metric is not None:
416                        custom_metric = self.custom_metric(y_test, y_pred)
417                        CUSTOM_METRIC.append(custom_metric)
418                    if self.verbose > 0:
419                        if self.custom_metric is not None:
420                            print(
421                                {
422                                    "Model": name,
423                                    "Accuracy": accuracy,
424                                    "Balanced Accuracy": b_accuracy,
425                                    "ROC AUC": roc_auc,
426                                    "F1 Score": f1,
427                                    self.custom_metric.__name__: custom_metric,
428                                    "Time taken": time.time() - start,
429                                }
430                            )
431                        else:
432                            print(
433                                {
434                                    "Model": name,
435                                    "Accuracy": accuracy,
436                                    "Balanced Accuracy": b_accuracy,
437                                    "ROC AUC": roc_auc,
438                                    "F1 Score": f1,
439                                    "Time taken": time.time() - start,
440                                }
441                            )
442                    if self.predictions:
443                        predictions[name] = y_pred
444                except Exception as exception:
445                    if self.ignore_warnings is False:
446                        print(name + " model failed to execute")
447                        print(exception)
448
449        else:  # no preprocessing
450
451            for name, model in tqdm(self.classifiers):  # do parallel exec
452                start = time.time()
453                try:
454                    if "random_state" in model().get_params().keys():
455                        layer_clf = CustomClassifier(
456                            obj=model(random_state=self.random_state),
457                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
458                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
459                            a=self.a,
460                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
461                            bias=self.bias,
462                            dropout=self.dropout,
463                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
464                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
465                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
466                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
467                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
468                            col_sample=self.col_sample,
469                            row_sample=self.row_sample,
470                            seed=self.seed,
471                            backend=self.backend,
472                        )
473
474                    else:
475                        layer_clf = CustomClassifier(
476                            obj=model(),
477                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
478                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
479                            a=self.a,
480                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
481                            bias=self.bias,
482                            dropout=self.dropout,
483                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
484                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
485                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
486                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
487                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
488                            col_sample=self.col_sample,
489                            row_sample=self.row_sample,
490                            seed=self.seed,
491                            backend=self.backend,
492                        )
493
494                    layer_clf.fit(X_train, y_train)
495
496                    for _ in range(self.n_layers):
497                        layer_clf = deepcopy(
498                            CustomClassifier(
499                                obj=layer_clf,
500                                n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
501                                activation_name=self.activation_name,
502                                a=self.a,
503                                nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
504                                bias=self.bias,
505                                dropout=self.dropout,
506                                direct_link=self.direct_link,
507                                n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
508                                cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
509                                type_clust=self.type_clust,
510                                type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
511                                col_sample=self.col_sample,
512                                row_sample=self.row_sample,
513                                seed=self.seed,
514                                backend=self.backend,
515                            )
516                        )
517
518                        # layer_clf.fit(X_train, y_train)
519
520                    layer_clf.fit(X_train, y_train)
521
522                    self.models[name] = layer_clf
523                    y_pred = layer_clf.predict(X_test)
524                    accuracy = accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred, normalize=True)
525                    b_accuracy = balanced_accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred)
526                    f1 = f1_score(y_test, y_pred, average="weighted")
527                    try:
528                        roc_auc = roc_auc_score(y_test, y_pred)
529                    except Exception as exception:
530                        roc_auc = None
531                        if self.ignore_warnings is False:
532                            print("ROC AUC couldn't be calculated for " + name)
533                            print(exception)
534                    names.append(name)
535                    Accuracy.append(accuracy)
536                    B_Accuracy.append(b_accuracy)
537                    ROC_AUC.append(roc_auc)
538                    F1.append(f1)
539                    TIME.append(time.time() - start)
540                    if self.custom_metric is not None:
541                        custom_metric = self.custom_metric(y_test, y_pred)
542                        CUSTOM_METRIC.append(custom_metric)
543                    if self.verbose > 0:
544                        if self.custom_metric is not None:
545                            print(
546                                {
547                                    "Model": name,
548                                    "Accuracy": accuracy,
549                                    "Balanced Accuracy": b_accuracy,
550                                    "ROC AUC": roc_auc,
551                                    "F1 Score": f1,
552                                    self.custom_metric.__name__: custom_metric,
553                                    "Time taken": time.time() - start,
554                                }
555                            )
556                        else:
557                            print(
558                                {
559                                    "Model": name,
560                                    "Accuracy": accuracy,
561                                    "Balanced Accuracy": b_accuracy,
562                                    "ROC AUC": roc_auc,
563                                    "F1 Score": f1,
564                                    "Time taken": time.time() - start,
565                                }
566                            )
567                    if self.predictions:
568                        predictions[name] = y_pred
569                except Exception as exception:
570                    if self.ignore_warnings is False:
571                        print(name + " model failed to execute")
572                        print(exception)
573
574        if self.custom_metric is None:
575            scores = pd.DataFrame(
576                {
577                    "Model": names,
578                    "Accuracy": Accuracy,
579                    "Balanced Accuracy": B_Accuracy,
580                    "ROC AUC": ROC_AUC,
581                    "F1 Score": F1,
582                    "Time Taken": TIME,
583                }
584            )
585        else:
586            scores = pd.DataFrame(
587                {
588                    "Model": names,
589                    "Accuracy": Accuracy,
590                    "Balanced Accuracy": B_Accuracy,
591                    "ROC AUC": ROC_AUC,
592                    "F1 Score": F1,
593                    self.custom_metric.__name__: CUSTOM_METRIC,
594                    "Time Taken": TIME,
595                }
596            )
597        scores = scores.sort_values(by=self.sort_by, ascending=False).set_index(
598            "Model"
599        )
600
601        if self.predictions:
602            predictions_df = pd.DataFrame.from_dict(predictions)
603        return scores, predictions_df if self.predictions is True else scores

Fit classifiers to X_train and y_train, predict and score on X_test, y_test.

Parameters:

X_train: array-like,
    Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
    and columns is the number of features.

X_test: array-like,
    Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
    and columns is the number of features.

y_train: array-like,
    Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
    and columns is the number of features.

y_test: array-like,
    Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
    and columns is the number of features.

Returns:

scores: Pandas DataFrame
    Returns metrics of all the models in a Pandas DataFrame.

predictions: Pandas DataFrame
    Returns predictions of all the models in a Pandas DataFrame.
def provide_models(self, X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test): 
605    def provide_models(self, X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test):
606        """Returns all the model objects trained. If fit hasn't been called yet,
607        then it's called to return the models.
608
609        Parameters:
610
611        X_train: array-like,
612            Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
613            and columns is the number of features.
614
615        X_test: array-like,
616            Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
617            and columns is the number of features.
618
619        y_train: array-like,
620            Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
621            and columns is the number of features.
622
623        y_test: array-like,
624            Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
625            and columns is the number of features.
626
627        Returns:
628
629            models: dict-object,
630                Returns a dictionary with each model's pipeline as value
631                and key = name of the model.
632        """
633        if len(self.models.keys()) == 0:
634            self.fit(X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test)
635
636        return self.models

Returns all the model objects trained. If fit hasn't been called yet, then it's called to return the models.

Parameters:

X_train: array-like, Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples and columns is the number of features.

X_test: array-like, Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples and columns is the number of features.

y_train: array-like, Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples and columns is the number of features.

y_test: array-like, Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples and columns is the number of features.

Returns:

models: dict-object,
    Returns a dictionary with each model's pipeline as value
    and key = name of the model.
class LazyDeepRegressor(nnetsauce.custom.custom.Custom, sklearn.base.RegressorMixin): 
 66class LazyDeepRegressor(Custom, RegressorMixin):
 67    """
 68        Fitting -- almost -- all the regression algorithms with layers of
 69        nnetsauce's CustomRegressor and returning their scores.
 70
 71    Parameters:
 72
 73        verbose: int, optional (default=0)
 74            Any positive number for verbosity.
 75
 76        ignore_warnings: bool, optional (default=True)
 77            When set to True, the warning related to algorigms that are not able to run are ignored.
 78
 79        custom_metric: function, optional (default=None)
 80            When function is provided, models are evaluated based on the custom evaluation metric provided.
 81
 82        predictions: bool, optional (default=False)
 83            When set to True, the predictions of all the models models are returned as dataframe.
 84
 85        sort_by: string, optional (default='Accuracy')
 86            Sort models by a metric. Available options are 'Accuracy', 'Balanced Accuracy', 'ROC AUC', 'F1 Score'
 87            or a custom metric identified by its name and provided by custom_metric.
 88
 89        random_state: int, optional (default=42)
 90            Reproducibiility seed.
 91
 92        estimators: list, optional (default='all')
 93            list of Estimators names or just 'all' (default='all')
 94
 95        preprocess: bool
 96            preprocessing is done when set to True
 97
 98        n_jobs : int, when possible, run in parallel
 99            For now, only used by individual models that support it.
100
101        n_layers: int, optional (default=3)
102            Number of layers of CustomRegressors to be used.
103
104        All the other parameters are the same as CustomRegressor's.
105
106    Examples:
107
108        import nnetsauce as ns
109        import numpy as np
110        from sklearn import datasets
111        from sklearn.utils import shuffle
112
113        diabetes = datasets.load_diabetes()
114        X, y = shuffle(diabetes.data, diabetes.target, random_state=13)
115        X = X.astype(np.float32)
116
117        offset = int(X.shape[0] * 0.9)
118        X_train, y_train = X[:offset], y[:offset]
119        X_test, y_test = X[offset:], y[offset:]
120
121        reg = ns.LazyDeepRegressor(verbose=0, ignore_warnings=False, custom_metric=None)
122        models, predictions = reg.fit(X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test)
123        print(models)
124
125    """
126
127    def __init__(
128        self,
129        verbose=0,
130        ignore_warnings=True,
131        custom_metric=None,
132        predictions=False,
133        random_state=42,
134        estimators="all",
135        preprocess=False,
136        n_jobs=None,
137        # Defining depth
138        n_layers=3,
139        # CustomRegressor attributes
140        obj=None,
141        n_hidden_features=5,
142        activation_name="relu",
143        a=0.01,
144        nodes_sim="sobol",
145        bias=True,
146        dropout=0,
147        direct_link=True,
148        n_clusters=2,
149        cluster_encode=True,
150        type_clust="kmeans",
151        type_scaling=("std", "std", "std"),
152        col_sample=1,
153        row_sample=1,
154        seed=123,
155        backend="cpu",
156    ):
157        self.verbose = verbose
158        self.ignore_warnings = ignore_warnings
159        self.custom_metric = custom_metric
160        self.predictions = predictions
161        self.models = {}
162        self.random_state = random_state
163        self.estimators = estimators
164        self.preprocess = preprocess
165        self.n_layers = n_layers - 1
166        self.n_jobs = n_jobs
167        super().__init__(
168            obj=obj,
169            n_hidden_features=n_hidden_features,
170            activation_name=activation_name,
171            a=a,
172            nodes_sim=nodes_sim,
173            bias=bias,
174            dropout=dropout,
175            direct_link=direct_link,
176            n_clusters=n_clusters,
177            cluster_encode=cluster_encode,
178            type_clust=type_clust,
179            type_scaling=type_scaling,
180            col_sample=col_sample,
181            row_sample=row_sample,
182            seed=seed,
183            backend=backend,
184        )
185
186    def fit(self, X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test):
187        """Fit Regression algorithms to X_train and y_train, predict and score on X_test, y_test.
188
189        Parameters:
190
191            X_train : array-like,
192                Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
193                and columns is the number of features.
194
195            X_test : array-like,
196                Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
197                and columns is the number of features.
198
199            y_train : array-like,
200                Training vectors, where rows is the number of samples
201                and columns is the number of features.
202
203            y_test : array-like,
204                Testing vectors, where rows is the number of samples
205                and columns is the number of features.
206
207        Returns:
208        -------
209        scores:  Pandas DataFrame
210            Returns metrics of all the models in a Pandas DataFrame.
211
212        predictions : Pandas DataFrame
213            Returns predictions of all the models in a Pandas DataFrame.
214
215        """
216        R2 = []
217        ADJR2 = []
218        RMSE = []
219        # WIN = []
220        names = []
221        TIME = []
222        predictions = {}
223
224        if self.custom_metric:
225            CUSTOM_METRIC = []
226
227        if isinstance(X_train, np.ndarray):
228            X_train = pd.DataFrame(X_train)
229            X_test = pd.DataFrame(X_test)
230
231        numeric_features = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns
232        categorical_features = X_train.select_dtypes(include=["object"]).columns
233
234        categorical_low, categorical_high = get_card_split(
235            X_train, categorical_features
236        )
237
238        if self.preprocess is True:
239            preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
240                transformers=[
241                    ("numeric", numeric_transformer, numeric_features),
242                    (
243                        "categorical_low",
244                        categorical_transformer_low,
245                        categorical_low,
246                    ),
247                    (
248                        "categorical_high",
249                        categorical_transformer_high,
250                        categorical_high,
251                    ),
252                ]
253            )
254
255        if self.estimators == "all":
256            self.regressors = DEEPREGRESSORS
257        else:
258            self.regressors = [
259                ("DeepCustomRegressor(" + est[0] + ")", est[1])
260                for est in all_estimators()
261                if (
262                    issubclass(est[1], RegressorMixin)
263                    and (est[0] in self.estimators)
264                )
265            ]
266
267        if self.preprocess is True:
268
269            for name, model in tqdm(self.regressors):  # do parallel exec
270                start = time.time()
271                try:
272                    if "random_state" in model().get_params().keys():
273                        layer_regr = CustomRegressor(
274                            obj=model(random_state=self.random_state),
275                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
276                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
277                            a=self.a,
278                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
279                            bias=self.bias,
280                            dropout=self.dropout,
281                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
282                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
283                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
284                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
285                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
286                            col_sample=self.col_sample,
287                            row_sample=self.row_sample,
288                            seed=self.seed,
289                            backend=self.backend,
290                        )
291                    else:
292                        layer_regr = CustomRegressor(
293                            obj=model(),
294                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
295                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
296                            a=self.a,
297                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
298                            bias=self.bias,
299                            dropout=self.dropout,
300                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
301                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
302                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
303                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
304                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
305                            col_sample=self.col_sample,
306                            row_sample=self.row_sample,
307                            seed=self.seed,
308                            backend=self.backend,
309                        )
310
311                    for _ in range(self.n_layers):
312                        layer_regr = deepcopy(
313                            CustomRegressor(
314                                obj=layer_regr,
315                                n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
316                                activation_name=self.activation_name,
317                                a=self.a,
318                                nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
319                                bias=self.bias,
320                                dropout=self.dropout,
321                                direct_link=self.direct_link,
322                                n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
323                                cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
324                                type_clust=self.type_clust,
325                                type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
326                                col_sample=self.col_sample,
327                                row_sample=self.row_sample,
328                                seed=self.seed,
329                                backend=self.backend,
330                            )
331                        )
332
333                    layer_regr.fit(X_train, y_train)
334
335                    pipe = Pipeline(
336                        steps=[
337                            ("preprocessor", preprocessor),
338                            ("regressor", layer_regr),
339                        ]
340                    )
341
342                    pipe.fit(X_train, y_train)
343
344                    self.models[name] = pipe
345                    y_pred = pipe.predict(X_test)
346                    r_squared = r2_score(y_test, y_pred)
347                    adj_rsquared = adjusted_rsquared(
348                        r_squared, X_test.shape[0], X_test.shape[1]
349                    )
350                    rmse = mean_squared_error(y_test, y_pred, squared=False)
351
352                    names.append(name)
353                    R2.append(r_squared)
354                    ADJR2.append(adj_rsquared)
355                    RMSE.append(rmse)
356                    TIME.append(time.time() - start)
357
358                    if self.custom_metric:
359                        custom_metric = self.custom_metric(y_test, y_pred)
360                        CUSTOM_METRIC.append(custom_metric)
361
362                    if self.verbose > 0:
363                        scores_verbose = {
364                            "Model": name,
365                            "R-Squared": r_squared,
366                            "Adjusted R-Squared": adj_rsquared,
367                            "RMSE": rmse,
368                            "Time taken": time.time() - start,
369                        }
370
371                        if self.custom_metric:
372                            scores_verbose[self.custom_metric.__name__] = (
373                                custom_metric
374                            )
375
376                        print(scores_verbose)
377                    if self.predictions:
378                        predictions[name] = y_pred
379                except Exception as exception:
380                    if self.ignore_warnings is False:
381                        print(name + " model failed to execute")
382                        print(exception)
383
384        else:  # no preprocessing
385
386            for name, model in tqdm(self.regressors):  # do parallel exec
387                start = time.time()
388                try:
389                    if "random_state" in model().get_params().keys():
390                        layer_regr = CustomRegressor(
391                            obj=model(random_state=self.random_state),
392                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
393                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
394                            a=self.a,
395                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
396                            bias=self.bias,
397                            dropout=self.dropout,
398                            direct_link=self.direct_link,
399                            n_clusters=self.n_clusters,
400                            cluster_encode=self.cluster_encode,
401                            type_clust=self.type_clust,
402                            type_scaling=self.type_scaling,
403                            col_sample=self.col_sample,
404                            row_sample=self.row_sample,
405                            seed=self.seed,
406                            backend=self.backend,
407                        )
408                    else:
409                        layer_regr = CustomRegressor(
410                            obj=model(),
411                            n_hidden_features=self.n_hidden_features,
412                            activation_name=self.activation_name,
413                            a=self.a,
414                            nodes_sim=self.nodes_sim,
415                            bias=self.bias,
